thread.title: Sherlock fans to get a New Year's Day treat at the cinema
thread.title_full: Sherlock fans to get a New Year's Day treat at the cinema

title: Sherlock fans to get a New Year's Day treat at the cinema
text:
Sherlock fans to get a New Year's Day treat at the cinema Sherlock fans to get a New Year's Day treat at the cinema 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
A special edition of Sherlock, the hit drama starring Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman, is to be shown in more than 100 cinemas on New Yearâ€™s Day, to complement the TV broadcast on BBC One. 
Sherlock: The Abominable Bride, a one-off episode set in Victorian London in 1895, will be shown in venues including Picturehouse Cinemas, Odeon, Cineworld and Vue. (Robert Viglasky/Hartswood Films/PA) 
BBC Worldwide UK, in partnership with Hartswood Films, said cinemagoers will be treated to exclusive bonus material, including a guided tour of 221B Baker Street from co-creator and executive producer Steven Moffat and a look behind the scenes at how the episode was made. Share article 
Tickets go on sale on November 2. Promoted Stories
